Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to show people communicating over a distance.
The student can illustrate that the string telephone is a device that uses sound to communicate.
The student can depict features of the string telephone that help it send or receive information over a distance.
The student can use provided materials in the drawing to show how the device works.
The student can show how the string must be tight for the sound to travel effectively.
The student can demonstrate how the string telephone helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance through illustration.
